typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,

		Column_6 as string,

		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,

		Column_23 as string,
		Column_24 as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		Column_26 as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		Column_28 as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		Column_30 as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		Column_32 as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		Column_34 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,

		Column_26 as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		Column_28 as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		Column_30 as string,

		Column_32 as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		Column_34 as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source3
source1, source2 join(source1@Column_1 == source2@Column_1,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate() ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
